task.title: Check for Cold Solder Joints
task.shortdesc: Solder didn't fully bond to the lug or casing (dull, grainy, or blobbed look).

step.cmd: Reheat the joint until the solder flows smoothly and makes good contact.
Verify solid solder connection by tugging on the wires slightly.

result.p: If sound is restored, the problem was cold solder joints.
